get.summary: Retrieves a collection of airplanes.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`include`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/including-relationships.html)/[`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

200.description: Successfully returns the found airplanes, or an empty array if none were found.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

head.summary: Retrieves a collection of airplanes without returning them.
head.description: Compare the returned ETag HTTP header with an earlier one to determine if the response has changed since it was fetched.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`include`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/including-relationships.html)/[`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

Content-Length.description: Size of the HTTP response body, in bytes.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`include`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/including-relationships.html)/[`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

requestBody.description: The attributes and relationships of the airplane to create.

201.description: The airplane was successfully created, which resulted in additional changes. The newly created airplane is returned.

Location.description: The URL at which the newly created airplane can be retrieved.

204.description: The airplane was successfully created, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The query string is invalid or the request body is missing or malformed.

403.description: Client-generated IDs cannot be used at this endpoint.

404.description: A related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

204.description: The airplane was successfully deleted.

post.summary: Adds existing flights to the flights relationship of an individual airplane.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the airplane to add flights to.

requestBody.description: The identities of the flights to add to the flights relationship.

204.description: The flights were successfully added, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The airplane or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

patch.summary: Assigns existing flights to the flights relationship of an individual airplane.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the airplane whose flights relationship to assign.

requestBody.description: The identities of the flights to assign to the flights relationship, or an empty array to clear the relationship.

204.description: The flights relationship was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The airplane or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

delete.summary: Removes existing flights from the flights relationship of an individual airplane.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the airplane to remove flights from.

requestBody.description: The identities of the flights to remove from the flights relationship.

204.description: The flights were successfully removed, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The airplane or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the flight whose related passenger identities to retrieve.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

Content-Length.description: Size of the HTTP response body, in bytes.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

post.summary: Adds existing passengers to the passengers relationship of an individual flight.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the flight to add passengers to.

requestBody.description: The identities of the passengers to add to the passengers relationship.

204.description: The passengers were successfully added, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The flight or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

patch.summary: Assigns existing passengers to the passengers relationship of an individual flight.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the flight whose passengers relationship to assign.

requestBody.description: The identities of the passengers to assign to the passengers relationship, or an empty array to clear the relationship.

204.description: The passengers relationship was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The flight or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

delete.summary: Removes existing passengers from the passengers relationship of an individual flight.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the flight to remove passengers from.

requestBody.description: The identities of the passengers to remove from the passengers relationship.

204.description: The passengers were successfully removed, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The flight or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

get.summary: Retrieves the related flight-attendant of an individual flight's purser relationship.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the flight whose related flight-attendant to retrieve.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`include`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/including-relationships.html)/[`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

200.description: Successfully returns the found flight-attendant, or `null` if it was not found.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

requestBody.description: The attributes and relationships of the passenger to create.

201.description: The passenger was successfully created, which resulted in additional changes. The newly created passenger is returned.

Location.description: The URL at which the newly created passenger can be retrieved.

204.description: The passenger was successfully created, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The query string is invalid or the request body is missing or malformed.

403.description: Client-generated IDs cannot be used at this endpoint.

404.description: A related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the passenger to update.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`include`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/including-relationships.html)/[`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

requestBody.description: The attributes and relationships of the passenger to update. Omitted fields are left unchanged.

200.description: The passenger was successfully updated, which resulted in additional changes. The updated passenger is returned.

204.description: The passenger was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The query string is invalid or the request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The passenger or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: A resource type or identifier in the request body is incompatible.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

delete.summary: Deletes an existing passenger by its identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the passenger to delete.

204.description: The passenger was successfully deleted.

airline.description: Lists the various airlines used in this API.

manufactured-at.description: Gets the day on which this airplane was manufactured.
